content:
Generate three new lines for an incomplete poem with the additional constraint that each line must contain a word with more than five syllables. 
As the fiery orb ascended heavenward 
Its arrival brought forth a brilliant glow 
And with its rays a gentle heat bestowed

Upon the horizon, an iridescent spectacle unfolds,  
Transcending the mundane with unparalleled magnificence,  
An ephemeral harmony whispers through the zephyr.
